derivation_policy.description: Deterministic calculation with discrete tip adjustment

tip_policy.notes: Each tip adds a linear correction of +5 system units before division

corrections.notes: No additional correction or interpolation is permitted

notes: 2/3 system is a pure calculation-based system
No candidate expansion or interpolation is allowed
Tip adjustment is discrete and linear
System values are preserved across symmetry transforms
All derivations operate strictly in system-value space
